name: Space Chip
description: Space Chip is a fun game set in Space with a nostalgic playmode which you have to pass through different levels full of adventure, teleporting through space gates and avoiding energy balls, spaceships, meteorites and “alienoids”.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only) Processor: Dual Core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb dedicated, Compatible with Open GL 2.1 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only) Processor: i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: gtx series Storage: 150 MB available space
